subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: In his first news conference since the N.C.A.A. penalized his program, a defiant Mr. Boeheim said on Thursday that he planned to appeal some of the penalties on Friday.
snippet: In his first news conference since the N.C.A.A. penalized his program, a defiant Mr. Boeheim said on Thursday that he planned to appeal some of the penalties on Friday.
